name: The Escape
paragraphs: You burst through the hospital doors and run out into the street. The cool air hits your face, and you know that you're finally safe. As you look back at the dark building, you can't help but feel a sense of relief mixed with regret. You hope that your parent made it out alive, but you know that you couldn't risk your own life to find out.

As you continue to run down the empty street, you suddenly stop in front of a small convenience store. You're out of breath and thirsty, so you decide to go in and buy a drink. As you're standing in line, you notice a strange symbol on the wall behind the counter. It's familiar, but you can't quite place where you've seen it before. You shrug it off and pay for your drink, but as you walk back outside, you can't shake the feeling that something isn't right.
